data.title: MARTA
data.text:
ORACLE CLOUD (NEW)

First-Time Users of Oracle Cloud: Your username is the same as Oracle EBS. After selecting the link below, please select the forgot password link to reset your password.

Click HERE to use the new platform (Oracle Cloud) to perform the following functions:

Apply for a job (using Oracle Recruiting Cloud - ORC)

View or update personal information (name, marital status, contact info, address, family, and emergency contacts; view personal ID info)

Refer others for MARTA jobs

Submit own resignation

Complete the Exit Interview form

View MARTA Directory

View employment info: current assignment/job history

As a Manager, use your Oracle Cloud account to:

Initiate job requisition

Submit a separation request

Change manager/change direct reports

View team’s employment info

View team’s salary history

Delegate approvals to team members during your absence

Add ad-hoc approvers to the approval workflow

Run the Rep Non-operator Supervisor Seniority Report

ORACLE EBS (LEGACY SYSTEM)

Please note that your login credentials for Oracle EBS will not change. You will have two accounts (Oracle Cloud) and (Oracle EBS) until Oracle Cloud has been fully implemented across the authority.

Click HERE to continue to use your Oracle EBS account to perform any of the functions included below.

Submit your timesheet (using Oracle Time & Labor – OTL)

Print employee verification letter with or without salary

Send automated employment verification to a third party via email

Update your payroll direct deposit account

View/print your W2 form

Submit an Alternate Work Option request

Complete and submit the D&I Intake form

Complete and submit the Employee Relations Intake form

Submit an External Training request for approval

Submit a Job Roll notification

Request a Transfer Sick Leave request (Represented employees)

Request Payroll Advance

Request to Sell PTO VAC

Submit a Retirement Notice

Request Travel Authorization

Request Tuition Reimbursement

Access Non-Operator Current or Prior Timesheet

Access Operator Current or Prior Timesheet

Access Operator Schedule

View your pay slip

View/update your federal and state tax form

Access the voluntary benefits calculator

Select W2 form delivery preference

As a Manager, continue to perform the following functions in the legacy system, Oracle EBS:

Approve timesheets

Submit MARTA External Training Request form for your direct reports

Access the following Mgr Self Service Reports

MARTA SS Attendance Detail Report by Employee and Leave

MARTA SS Attendance Report by Employee – Detail

MARTA SS Attendance Report by Employee - Summary
